lines.content: So you like choices. Good on ya mate. some of this editor looks very wonky, but it all does the job. honestly idk how to go on from now. have an sfx instr ig
oh my god you don't like choices what the fuck. [mp]I'm gonna make you say yes.
Hello there.[ap]the text should've just paused for a second.[ap]and again. Welcome to this tech demo!
YOOOO WHATS UP it's me swagbot!![mp]good job clicking to continue reading. jjust[lc]one[lc]thing.
